pr_title: Fix the issue 10325: Readme content of Azure Storage File Data Lake is unclear and inconsistencey

timeline.author: alzimmermsft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -189,6 +193,7 @@ or
 
 <!-- embedme ./src/samples/java/com/azure/storage/file/datalake/ReadmeSamples.java#L32-L34 -->
 ```java
+// Only one "?" is needed here. If the sastoken starts with "?", please removing one "?".
 DataLakeServiceClient dataLakeServiceClient = new DataLakeServiceClientBuilder()
     .endpoint("<your-storage-account-url>" + "?" + "<your-sasToken>")

replies.bodyText:
I have used the released version dependency for azure-storage, so that I could run the commad you provided.
Also, I download NodeJs to run this command npx embedme README.md and these README code samples are generated.
replies.author: Melanie-Ma

timeline.message: fix the issue of pr build
update README.md by using the command npx embedme README.md
